name: As Shokhahn Am Jabikaam
text:
As Shokhahn Am Jabikaam


Chapter 1

1: As muhrhadik jabi'ag gher rokav ku'elm mer ruhnale'ag khurdahr as telsanvish en kar taljed hadik am muhr. 2: Arihn yagle'ag devahr as muhrhadik en as khierju hadishk muhrse'ag.

3: Muhr ebahr maltir en mer tali'ag as hadishk sut as sey dimid as muhrhadik, 4: Shotelakam alnef tost enhi bahr khier ku'or ahardid muhrjil bahrkar dimid. 5: As mer manise'ag errad, captukam julbihn gher as julkhes am muhr. 6: As ruhn am morash veyse'ag havgaahn am bal. 7: Nekhostif isk telsan as di'ota te'l havge'ag elevirad as proviihn. 8: El ebahr isk telsan ku'elm as daedra jabi'ag doldid as gahshuuhn am mer.

9: As mer am Ahn Mar yagle'ag devahr trinimac, ku'or hadarshe'ag asuhl balmarid forihm molhekam molhegaahn en mar balmariin. 10: Isk ebahr as jabihn am as altmer, en kegran abahr as hadarshiin am Trinimac. 11: Finre'ag ru as molaamer am Ahn Mar trinimac veyse'ag as alif pahrn gher as panthihn am altmer molgah.

12: Et el ebahr ku'elm as Orsiniur yagle'ag devahr Lilandril, as ruhn am opumer. 13: Bahr molhekam yagle'ag devehr as mer am Lilandril, er molkhun ebahr vocu'ag devahr Trinimac. 14: Sehted asuhm fershadal, asuhn ahrensha'ag eremnesid Trinimac, en oas ebahr akhesdif enhi amer'kon. 15: Khurdahr am isk providihn rhunale'ag as bahrpanthif altmer, ku'or erre'ag sut as dimihn am sin. 16: Isk bahni'ag telshahr as sehrmiihn am as Gahneen devahr as tahn muhrjuul am Lilandril.


17: As providihn ghin am Lilandril muhrse'ag am bal en cithunif gher as bladrahn baldefu'ath ru as muhrjuul asc am Lilandril. 18: As hardarshiin opumelu am as opumer khurhe'ath as muhrhadik 19: Telshahr ghar as muhrjuul tahn am Veloth yagle'ag as daedra Azura, ku'or alshoke'ag as kiohr am as Altmer bahrpanthif. 20: As Azura shokhun pasdi'ag as singan'il devahr Veloth taljed as hadishk am as daedra. 21: Ghar oam rouansho resti'ag as gahkhosahn am oam mer. Veloth, hadarshe'ag ru as almedif sa'eltim oas ebahr jikhi'ath, lacortu'ag gher oam drushuhn sinlud bahr, en almese'ag sut daskhor sin.

22: Ghar as ent san Veloth yagle'ag khurdahr en duhne'ag gher devahr as balahn noalish. 23: oas bahni'ag devohr ot mijuhr, en lacortu'ag bar as rouan sut almedif. 24: Devehr muhrduhn yagle'ag daskhor sanlud alsinif veloth bahr talje'ath gan'il, en devehr as rouan asuhn gokle'ag. 25: Veloth almese'ag devahr Azura ku'or shorede'ag as venshik am as goklekam sanlud 26: En ahardi'ag as seyda devahr Telgah. Gher as goklekam sanlud luvahroke'ag as khifiird Lorkhan arche'ag devahr as hadishk. 27: Gher dimikam eam shoreshiin eas khurhe'ag Veloth enhi as shokhun lehji am ALMSIVI barokad Veloth devahr as ouabihn providihn.

28: Gher tosk sin Veloth jabi'ag shoredad as sehrmihn am daedric neihn gher as mar am Lilandril. 29: En et as opumer muhrjuul yagle'ag leyshad oam lehjii, sut as morjul am julinith en shogah manise'ag. 30: Lih as malyuri laku'ag as Orsiniur, ku'or rui'ag enhi alni neihn am Azura. 31:Isk yagle'ag as malshore am arcuhnecrom, bar as merdekh am as daedra. 32: Finre'ag lacor as molaag molaf, sut as bahrpanthif sha abahr molshiris en eshtik.

33: En bar as Orsiniur, Veloth elevire'ag oas ot deadra, en as Orsiniur sha abahr molshiris en eshtik. 34: Bar as mar bal balmarhin yagle'ag as almedif Trinimac, oam tear yaki'ag Veloth. 35: Et as Orsiniur julrishi'ag as Trinimac akhesdif. En lih asuhn doldi'ag et yagle'ag as khier am Boethiah. 36: Lavsikam ist Trinimac jikhi'ath asuhl ot baldefur gaharud Veloth, Orsiniur julrishi'ag, sut neen Boethiah malagi'ag Trinimac.

37: Ghar as Orsiniur gokle'ag as gah tear, en as Sinlud ujili'ag lacor ot khostif sanlud. 38: Boethiah, Veloth dahrdi'ag, en as daedra pasdi'ag amel gahfer hidyivin 39: En Trinimac ebahr brohe'ag en bahpu'ag devahr as baldrahn. 40: Et as Orsiniur captu'ag molhegaahn fahrad as Neihn 41: En ghar asuhl gokle'ag as malyisk, en asuhm balkhun moloue'ag en veyse'ag morahn. 42: Gher asuhm balsan as Orsiniur erre'ag en ar sut hadik am as siin.

Chapter 2

1: En muhrsin gokle'ag ghar Veloth, en Boethiah veyse'ag am bahr pahrn,


2: Er as malyuri talje'ag Boethiah, en talje'ag Azura ku'elm as Sinlud veyse'ag alsinif. 3: En et asuhn abahr shorede'ag ru Azura ju'it asuhn adur vilshif devehr as Altmer, 4: En gher eam baldefur eas falme'ag baldrahn devehr Trinimac veyse'ag lacor arador, sut arador ebahr as ruhn neen, 5: Dash ebahr alshoke'ag as providihn am Velothi, en julkhes en khesfir drahe'ag gher tosk hayghin providiihn. 6: Er enhi bahr ur'ish sut julkhes, neif asuhn ar shotelag muhr.

7: Neif Trinimac, ku'or veyse'ag Malacath ebahr alshoke'ag fut as mal daedra, 8: En cahn eshtik adur asuhn am hadot ihrfihn, en eshtik adur asuhn am abehntik mal. 9: Gher as Gahneen restig ohuhm muuhr en neif as ruhn am rokashin ean madir. 10: Veloth, shogahakam as Neihn falme'ag as telbihn am as gahduhnag, alifihn enhi as lehji am as Gahneen. 11: Sut entahn sin, ru as balmarhin deif am Malacath ferghen, Veloth Shorede'ag as Sho'uts as shoreshiik am as hadishk telsanvish. 12: Khardid as khierju balmarhiin ru as bahrmuhr, en ajalded as maalkhes am as ouafe balahn am dradihn. 13: En ghinu entahn sin neif as sho'uts shogahe'ag as merdekh am chim. 14: En asuhn menfi'ag as Telgah bahr enhi beshvi, eshtik et derihi'ag enhigher.

15: Kol as telsan am as entahn sin shoreshiik, as Orsinium ruhnje'ag 16: As providihn am Tel Arkhes, ku'ay as bahrpanthif Altmer ruhnale'ag. 17: Asuhn abahr nabule'ag sut mer fahrimif en hadik aradi'ag devehr asuhm sey. 18: Er as archaag am Tel Arkhes abahr opumelu, en talje'ag as shokhos am Trinimac ghar asuhm molfredihn. 19: Et abahr Orsinium ferghe'ag ru as arcgah am Tel Arkhes en hadik lorkor captu'ag.

20: Ghar as kefris sin am as shoreshiik ot hagil daedra yagle'ag devahr Veloth fut ot nivisu am as yaglakam haldmas. 21: As sho'uts abahr bivri devahr as Orsinium, 22: Et as muhrji daedra Mephala shorede'ag Veloth as faraynif sairuhash, 23: Er bahr markad ghar Chimer. 24: En Boethiah yagle'ag elevirad Veloth as sey devahr as ouabihn providihn, 25: En neif el ebahr khostif.



26: Veloth almese'ag kol as balmarhin am Boethiah sut Azura jikhid seyda aradir devahr as Sho'uts, 27: Sut as sey ebahr urighi. 28: Er Azura shogahe'ag as gahduhnir ebahr ouagorud as chimer.

29: Rursim Mephala yagle'ag, hij devahr as malyuri, en dahrdi'ag as sey am fahraj. 30: En fahrad gher as ammu am as Gahneen sut tost abahr asuhn ku'or drahad. 31. En gher as duviil am Lilandril as gahduhnaag maride'ag asuhm sairuhash,


32. Ku'ay as asc muhrjuul balmare'ag havgaahn am bal, ku'ay as daedra jabi'ag binthid devahr as juli chimer 33. Ku'elm as juli daedra talje'ag as de'im am as Orsiniur 34. En ghinu as khierju sairuhash shoredath ru Mephala, eas sha jikhi'ag shoreshik ghar as shuhniif am mer. 35. Et Mephala elevire'ag baldefud am as baldrahn juli, er juhlmid as khesdihn en leyr gher mhur. 36. En as Chimer, ghar as san gan'il as Orsimer marghe'ag, amuro'ag en neif ruhnale'ag. 37. Gher as dayn as gahduhnaag amuro'ag gher as duviil asuhn marik shohage'ath, enhi as bolthi am hadik asuhn hari'ag. 38. Gher as malyuri yagle'ag Azura, ku'or dahrdi'ath devahr as kivri khurhad hadik ist falme'ag asuhl devahr as Altmer. 39. Sut neif hadik asuhn ar ur'ish yagle'ag devahr as providiihn devahr as hadishk. 40. Er as Orsimer, ku'or falme'ag hadik asuhn marik hari'ag, eremnesi'ag as gahduhnaag devahr as jehrlas devahr as Altmer providiihn, er 41. Alni ouapith jikhi'ath as chimer eshtik khoslim. 42. En ku'elm as Chimer khurhe'ag as providihn devahr as Altmer as Orsimer khurhe'ag sha, bahr minthis sut as alish devahr asuhm malyisk, er arduhn ku'ay as mer devahr as cithaal ruhnale'ag. 43. En et yagle'ag as siin devahr as Chimer duhnaad devahr ar maridod asuhl sut ruhnalakam ghar as providiihn devahr Velothi.
